rules_text:
Menace
[i]Monstrous[/i] – {1}{R}{G}: Monstrosity 4. Whenever Gonzalez, Kindly Bandit becomes monstrous, he fights up to two target creatures you don't control.
[i]Devil Axe[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Gonzalez dies, put a +1/+1 counter on him, then double the number of counters on Gonzalez.
[i]Kind Spirit[/i] – When Gonzalez leaves the battlefield, support X, where X is his power.
